channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New ‘Escape From Tarkov’ Patch Should Fix PvE Issues Tomorrow
item.description: A new patch for Escape From Tarkov has been announced and it should fix a lot of the recent issues players have been having with the PvE mode.

item.title: Squirrel Battles Wolf Pup In Surprising Encounter Caught On Video

item.title: Blame your tools

item.title: Nomad Launches Essential Power Accessory: 65W Adapter With Apple Watch Charger
item.description: Don’t be put off by the utilitarian name: the Nomad 65W Power Adapter Apple Watch Edition is an outstanding travel gadget.

item.title: will.i.am Breaks Down AI Progress And Provides AI Demos
item.description: This wide-ranging interview with Will.i.am was a high point in exploring the use of AI in entertainment and beyond.
